Module hanyaeger.api

Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferedMoveable  
    DirectionProvider
    A DirectionProvider exposes a method to acquire the direction.
    LocationUpdater
    A LocationUpdater can calculate a new location.
    MotionApplier
    Base interface of all Objects that apply a motion to a subclass of YaegerEntity.
    MotionModifier
    A MotionModifier is capable of modifying a motion.
    Moveable  
    Rotatable
    Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    SpeedProvider
    A SpeedProvider exposes a method to acquire the speed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultMotionApplier
    A DefaultMotionApplier is an implementation of MotionApplier that does not abide the laws of Physics and only provides basis behaviour regarding speed and direction.
    EntityMotionInitBuffer
    An EntityMotionInitBuffer is used to support the option to set the speed and direction of an YaegerEntity from the constructor.
    RotationBuffer
    A RotationBuffer is a simple data container, only used for storing the value of rotate, in case it is set before a Node is available.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Convenience enum for setting the Direction.
